alert.note: Alert for Coastal Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Rip Current Statement issued September 29 at 7:40PM EDT until October 01 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM EDT SUNDAY... ...HIGH RIP CURRENT RISK REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the Coastal Flood Advisory, minor to moderate coastal flooding. For the High Rip Current Risk, dangerous rip currents. * WHERE...Coastal Palm Beach County. * WHEN...For the Coastal Flood Advisory, until 3 PM EDT Sunday. For the High Rip Current Risk, through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. Rip currents can sweep even the best swimmers away from shore into deeper water. * LAKE WORTH HIGH TIDE TIMES...826 AM EDT and 848 PM EDT Friday.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. Swim near a lifeguard. If caught in a rip current, relax and float. Don`t swim against the current. If able, swim in a direction following the shoreline. If unable to escape, face the shore and call or wave for help.
